name: UpdateNotebook
description:
Update a specific notebook's details.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific notebook identified by its project and notebook IDs. Suitable for modifying existing notebook content or configuration.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you are accessing. Retrieve it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: notebook_short_id
parameters.description: Provide the unique short ID of the notebook to be updated.

parameters.name: notebook_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details to update a notebook, including ID, title, content, version, etc.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
